summary: The gold medal for the men's 10,000-metre race in the 1996 Atlanta Olympics is won by Ethiopian Haile Gebrselassie.
cast: Haile Gebrselassie|Shawananness Gebrselassie|Yonas Zergaw|Tedesse Haile|Bekele Gebrselassie|Alem Tellahun|Assefa Gebrselassie|Tizazu Mashresha|Winishet Tesfaye|Abinet Tedesse|Berhane Tesfaye|Bekele Negash|Berhane Taye|Endale Workineh|Zinash Workineh|Mengistu Workineh|Bashamyelesh Workineh
title: Endurance
